entry.title: Release 0.1.7
entry.content: Hotfix for bug found in user testing where a previously signed-in user could not access the home screen.
entry.summary: Hotfix for bug found in user testing where a previously signed-in user could not access the home screen.

entry.title: Release 0.1.6
entry.content:
No visible changes.

Added the BILLING permission to the app to allow for the future addition of in-app permissions.

entry.title: Release 0.1.5
entry.content:
Major overhaul of the app’s business logic, so the number of noticeable bugs should be much lower than before.

New Features:

  • Trial option on signup, uses local phone storage with no need to create an account. Bugfixes:

Bugfixes:

  • Text overflowing on Todo Cards
  • Todo items are not created for repeating tasks
  • Couldn’t open the add/edit screens multiple times
entry.summary: Major overhaul of the app’s business logic, so the number of noticeable bugs should be much lower than before.

entry.title: Release 0.1.4
entry.content:
Improvements targeted at improving the sign up and sign in UX.

New features:

  • Forgot Password button
  • Email Verification for new accounts

Bug fixes:

  • Keyboard’s “next” and “done” buttons implemented
  • Missing and broken form validation fixed
entry.summary: Improvements targeted at improving the sign up and sign in UX.

entry.title: Release 0.1.3
entry.content:
auToDo is now doing a much better job of keeping statistics on your car’s refueling history. You can view these stats in the Statistics tab on the home screen, and the stats are used to make sure that notifications for your upcoming ToDo items are delivered on time.

New Features:

  • Github Issue: Due Dates are now predicted for mileage-only ToDo items based on driving behavior.
  • Github Issue: The fuel efficiency stat for refueling entries is conditionally shaded based on fuel efficiency history
  • Github Issue: Added content to the Statistics tab on the home screen - currently showing the historical data of fuel efficiency and rate of miles driven per day

Bugfixes:

  • Github Issue: fixed bug that made it impossible to create new refuelings with decimal cost or amount values
  • Github Issue: now properly organizing ToDo items with the soonest upcoming item appearing first on the home screen

This release is available to alpha testers on the Google Play Store.
entry.summary: auToDo is now doing a much better job of keeping statistics on your car’s refueling history. You can view these stats in the Statistics tab on the home screen, and the stats are used to make sure that notifications for your upcoming ToDo items are delivered on time.

entry.title: Release 0.1.2
entry.content:
A variety of much needed bug-fixes. This release is available to alpha testers on the Google Play Store.

The following issues were closed with this release:

  • Github Issue: Conditional shading/preface text for ToDo cards
  • Github Issue: No field for associating a ToDo item with a car
  • Github Issue: Set a BottomTabController background color that fits with the application
  • Github Issue: No todos are created with repeats when creating a new user account
  • Github Issue: Verify Core Functionality
  • Github Issue: Add a button for a User to delete their account
  • Github Issue: Repeating Tasks cannot be properly deleted
  • Github Issue: Associated ToDo items are not updated when their repeating interval changes
  • Github Issue: Cannot create new repeats
  • Github Issue: Required fields aren’t actually required for new refuelings/todos
  • Github Issue: New standalone ToDo item throws an exception
  • Github Issue: Unhandled exception when car mileage is greater than the value input to a new refueling
  • Github Issue: Fix styling in new ToDo screen
  • Github Issue: Make a set of test plans for basic app functionality
  • Github Issue: Cannot update the soonest upcoming ToDo item
entry.summary: A variety of much needed bug-fixes. This release is available to alpha testers on the Google Play Store.
